description.value:
A witch's knowledge from their patron comes in the form of lessons, which you can learn by selecting feats like Basic Lesson. Each lesson grants you a hex and teaches your familiar a new spell, adding it to the spells you can prepare using your witch spellcasting. You gain this spell even if it's not on your tradition's spell list.

BASIC LESSONS

You can select from these lessons when a feat or another effect grants you a basic lesson.

Lesson of Dreams You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Veil of Dreams] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sleep].

Lesson of the Elements You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Elemental Betrayal] hex. Your familiar learns your choice of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Burning Hands], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Air Bubble], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hydraulic Push], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pummeling Rubble].

Lesson of Life You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Life Boost] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spirit Link].

Lesson of Protection You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blood Ward] hex; your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mage Armor].

Lesson of Vengeance You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Needle of Vengeance] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Phantom Pain].

GREATER LESSONS

You can select from these lessons when a feat or other effect grants you a greater lesson.

Lesson of Mischief You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Deceiver's Cloak] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mad Monkeys].

Lesson of Shadow You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Malicious Shadow] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chilling Darkness].

Lesson of Snow You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Personal Blizzard] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Wind].

MAJOR LESSONS

You can select from these lessons when a feat or other effect grants you a major lesson.

Lesson of Bargains You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Over the Coals] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Subconscious Suggestion].

Lesson of Death You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Curse of Death] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Raise Dead].

Lesson of Renewal You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Restorative Moment] hex, and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Field of Life].

Lesson of Baba Yaga [RARE] You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Glacial Heart] hex and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Ice].
